feed.title: MegaBot Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest MegaBot news and events.

entry.title: The First Bot website
entry.summary:
For the first time we have created a website allowing you to follow the news and all the changes related to our bot.

We really want to be closer to our community and that's why this blog also exists. Open source for us means making a tool available...
